value:
The uniforms that those in the Order
of Heroes wear are splendid. I wonder
if they'd let me wear one...$k$pI think the look would suit me very
well, don't you?

I was a knight of Zofia until
Chancellor Desaix's coup d'etat. My
dear brother was right there with me.

Worried about me? Oh, you! It's really
not necessary. You just take good
care of yourself, all right?

I'd love for you to join me for a lovely
cup of tea, and I'd even do you the
honor of preparing it myself.

I should write letters to everyone
back at our family manor. To
Father and Mother, of course!$k$pBut also to all our servants, the
maid, and the nursemaid... Oh!
And our private tutor, too.

I have come to bring you greetings
from $Nf.$k$pHow nice for you!

A fine result, quite fitting for
a noble.
Hmm. I suppose that will do.
A tad unsatisfying.

Now I'll be certain to shine for
all the world forevermore!

My name is Clair. I battle alongside
my dear brother in the Deliverance
forces that fight for Zofia.$k$pWhat fortune that you should
meet me like this!

Ah, there you are, my fine friend
$Nu!$k$pI was just thinking how nice it
would be to see your face.
Why, you ask?$k$pI suppose I've taken a liking to
you. Is there something so very
strange about that?$k$pYes? No? Perhaps? Well, let's
throw caution to the wind. It's
undeniable we have a bond.$k$pIt's quite mysterious, and perhaps
even fate. But I hope you don't
misunderstand.$k$pMy heart's fondest affections are
reserved for Alm— Oh! Please
forget I said that.$k$pStill, here is what I meant to say.
You have somehow become
very dear to me. That is all.
せやあっ
うふふっ
Is that all?
きゃあっ！
On your knees!
You brute!
Too late.
You should be honored!
Oh dear...
Heehee
I just couldn't be prouder of my brother.
My, my...
That Alm can be so distant.
I would give all I have if it would bring peace to this world.
I can't help but feel a little jealous of Mathilda's skill.
Honestly, I think Alm knows...
I've come to have more respect for you than you'd ever know.
Yes?
Very well.
Stand aside.
